name: scratch
attributes: # [doc = " スクラッチカードを削り、当選金を受け取るが、"]
# [doc = " scratch_card.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let card = & mut ctx . accounts . scratch_card ;
let reward = ctx . accounts . config . win_amount ;
card . times_scratched = card . times_scratched . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += reward ;
* * ctx . accounts . pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= reward ;

fields.name: scratch_card
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付けて"] # [doc = " scratch_card.owner と user.key() を照合検証すべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 削り操作を行うユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 当選金プール（Lamports 保管先）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 当選金設定を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このスクラッチカードを所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: card_id
fields.attribute: # [doc = " この操作で削ったカードの識別子"]

fields.name: times_scratched
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 削り操作回数（通常は 1 回）"]

fields.name: win_amount
fields.attribute: # [doc = " スクラッチ成功時の当選金（Lamports）"]
